Subject: Barely won
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=62491402
X-Yahoo-Profile: alternate_dph

Using my 'Trickster's Boost' on an elf, I managed to beat "Master
Slime" from my set.  It was hard and after trying to exit the level
when winning, my elf jumped from experience level 500 to 524 and
trashed the game.

My elf had interesting properties:

1)no matter what attack I used, I couldn't run out of mana.  Even
using the forest walk ability in a forest, only by using the most
powerfull attack was I able to barely drain off any of my mana.

2)it could outrun its own attacks. :-(

3)Since I had a virtually infinite amount of mana, I was able to use
the most advanced attack to create a barrier of protection by having
the rocks bounce off walls.  Of course, the most powerfull attack was
using the most advanced was running away from my opponent, while
firing, until I ran into a wall and then changing direction to run
into my opponent.  This combined on-slaught can quickly demolish most
my opponents, making it one of my favorite maneuvers with an elf.

Do I hear any other .. . unusual attacks . . that somebody has
employed to beat a scenario?
